desc.en: 滑著滑板來到休假約定場所的沙耶對著老師談論滑板的魅力。但是對滑板不熟悉的老師，想要像沙耶一樣滑滑板，卻摔了一大跤。
desc.jp: 滑著滑板來到休假約定場所的沙耶對著老師談論滑板的魅力。但是對滑板不熟悉的老師，想要像沙耶一樣滑滑板，卻摔了一大跤。
desc.zh_cn: 滑着滑板来到休假约定场所的沙耶对着老师谈论滑板的魅力。但是对滑板不熟悉的老师，想要像沙耶一样滑滑板，却摔了一大跤。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: 沙耶為了要品嚐「情侶專屬起司蛋糕」與根津助一起來到蛋糕店，但店員卻拒絕讓她點餐。不過多虧看到這個情形的老師表示自己與沙耶是一起來的，沙耶才順利點了蛋糕。
desc.jp: 沙耶為了要品嚐「情侶專屬起司蛋糕」與根津助一起來到蛋糕店，但店員卻拒絕讓她點餐。不過多虧看到這個情形的老師表示自己與沙耶是一起來的，沙耶才順利點了蛋糕。
desc.zh_cn: 沙耶为了要品尝「情侣专属起司蛋糕」与根津助一起来到蛋糕店，但店员却拒绝让她点餐。不过多亏看到这个情形的老师表示自己与沙耶是一起来的，沙耶才顺利点了蛋糕。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: 沙耶去了常去的拉麵店，店家請她協助改善新推出的拉麵味道太濃的問題。沙耶在拉麵裡添加特製醬料讓味道減輕，此舉成功獲得了辣味狂熱者們的讚賞。
desc.jp: 沙耶去了常去的拉麵店，店家請她協助改善新推出的拉麵味道太濃的問題。沙耶在拉麵裡添加特製醬料讓味道減輕，此舉成功獲得了辣味狂熱者們的讚賞。
desc.zh_cn: 沙耶去了常去的拉面店，店家请她协助改善新推出的拉面味道太浓的问题。沙耶在拉面里添加特制酱料让味道减轻，此举成功获得了辣味狂热者们的赞赏。

realname.zh_cn: 不变的平凡 钢琴版

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: 沙耶所研發的特製辣醬獲得高人氣，在玄武商會一帶被廣為使用。但是因為太受歡迎，導致所有食物都被加辣，生氣的沙耶便停止生產醬料。
desc.jp: 沙耶所研發的特製辣醬獲得高人氣，在玄武商會一帶被廣為使用。但是因為太受歡迎，導致所有食物都被加辣，生氣的沙耶便停止生產醬料。
desc.zh_cn: 沙耶所研发的特制辣酱获得高人气，在玄武商会一带被广为使用。但是因为太受欢迎，导致所有食物都被加辣，生气的沙耶便停止生产酱料。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: 沙耶為了協助在公園舉辦的活動，研發出一款「香味能讓身體放鬆」的香水，並向老師說明自己滑滑板的原因。沙耶滑著滑板將香水噴灑在公園各處，結果卻因為吸入太多香氣，導致身體過於放鬆而跌倒了。
desc.jp: 沙耶為了協助在公園舉辦的活動，研發出一款「香味能讓身體放鬆」的香水，並向老師說明自己滑滑板的原因。沙耶滑著滑板將香水噴灑在公園各處，結果卻因為吸入太多香氣，導致身體過於放鬆而跌倒了。
desc.zh_cn: 沙耶为了协助在公园举办的活动，研发出一款「香味能让身体放松」的香水，并向老师说明自己滑滑板的原因。沙耶滑着滑板将香水喷洒在公园各处，结果却因为吸入太多香气，导致身体过于放松而跌倒了。

desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry

举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

profile.en:
The genius inventor of Shanhaijing on a day off from her busy life.

Contrary to her usual days of being confined to the lab and devoting herself solely to researching new elixirs, Saya is active enough to ride a skateboard and roam around the streets during her days off. However, her constant intellectual curiosity for exploring new things remains the same even when she's taking it easy.
profile.jp:
山海経高級中学校所属、忙しい日常から抜け出して久々の休日を満喫している天才発明家。

研究室に閉じこもって新薬の研究に没頭する普段の姿とは異なり、休日のサヤはスケートボードで街を駆け回るような活動的な様を見せる。しかし休日だからと言って、絶えず新しいものを追求し続ける彼女の知的好奇心が変わることはない。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
山海经高级中学所属，从繁忙日常中抽出时间来享受久违假日的「炼丹术研究会」天才发明家。

与平时埋头于研究室闭门研究新药的样子不同，假日的纱绫有着滑着滑板穿梭在街道之中的活泼形象。
但即便是假日，她那不断探索新事物的好奇心也没有变。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
山海经高级中学所属，脱离繁忙日常，久违地享受假日的天才发明家。

和平时关在研究室埋头研究新药的身姿不同，假日的沙耶展现出活泼的样子，以滑板在街上来回奔走。
不过即使是假日，她追求新颖事物与知识的好奇心也依然没有改变。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
摆脱了繁忙的日常，享受着久违的休假的山海经天才发明家。

与平时一头扎进研究室专心研制新药的样子不同，休息日里的纱绫很活跃，甚至还会踏着滑板穿梭在街头。
不过，她不断探究新事物的求知欲在休息日也丝毫未变。

gacha.en: Even a genius like me needs some time off. Hahaha...
gacha.jp: ふっふっふ……いくら天才と言えども、休息は必要なのだ！
gacha.zh_cn_jp: 呼呼呼……对于天才来说，休息也是必要的！
gacha.zh_cn_tw: 哼哼哼……就算被说是天才，也是需要休息的！
gacha.zh_cn_cn: 天才也需要休息，哈—哈—哈！

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: 沙耶去了常去的拉麵店，店家請她協助改善新推出的拉麵味道太濃的問題。沙耶在拉麵裡添加特製醬料讓味道減輕，此舉成功獲得了辣味狂熱者們的讚賞。
desc.jp: 沙耶去了常去的拉麵店，店家請她協助改善新推出的拉麵味道太濃的問題。沙耶在拉麵裡添加特製醬料讓味道減輕，此舉成功獲得了辣味狂熱者們的讚賞。
desc.zh_cn: 沙耶去了常去的拉面店，店家请她协助改善新推出的拉面味道太浓的问题。沙耶在拉面里添加特制酱料让味道减轻，此举成功获得了辣味狂热者们的赞赏。

realname.zh_cn: 不变的平凡 钢琴版

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: 沙耶所研發的特製辣醬獲得高人氣，在玄武商會一帶被廣為使用。但是因為太受歡迎，導致所有食物都被加辣，生氣的沙耶便停止生產醬料。
desc.jp: 沙耶所研發的特製辣醬獲得高人氣，在玄武商會一帶被廣為使用。但是因為太受歡迎，導致所有食物都被加辣，生氣的沙耶便停止生產醬料。
desc.zh_cn: 沙耶所研发的特制辣酱获得高人气，在玄武商会一带被广为使用。但是因为太受欢迎，导致所有食物都被加辣，生气的沙耶便停止生产酱料。

举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: 沙耶為了協助在公園舉辦的活動，研發出一款「香味能讓身體放鬆」的香水，並向老師說明自己滑滑板的原因。沙耶滑著滑板將香水噴灑在公園各處，結果卻因為吸入太多香氣，導致身體過於放鬆而跌倒了。
desc.jp: 沙耶為了協助在公園舉辦的活動，研發出一款「香味能讓身體放鬆」的香水，並向老師說明自己滑滑板的原因。沙耶滑著滑板將香水噴灑在公園各處，結果卻因為吸入太多香氣，導致身體過於放鬆而跌倒了。
desc.zh_cn: 沙耶为了协助在公园举办的活动，研发出一款「香味能让身体放松」的香水，并向老师说明自己滑滑板的原因。沙耶滑着滑板将香水喷洒在公园各处，结果却因为吸入太多香气，导致身体过于放松而跌倒了。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: 因為工作疲勞以及孩子們惹出的麻煩而疲憊不堪的旬，拜訪了鍊丹術研究會的沙耶，看看是否有對美容有益的藥物。喝了從沙耶那裡得到的「回春秘藥」的旬，回到了以前的樣子。不巧遇到老師的她，不由自主地隱瞞了自己的真實身份。
desc.jp: 因為工作疲勞以及孩子們惹出的麻煩而疲憊不堪的旬，拜訪了鍊丹術研究會的沙耶，看看是否有對美容有益的藥物。喝了從沙耶那裡得到的「回春秘藥」的旬，回到了以前的樣子。不巧遇到老師的她，不由自主地隱瞞了自己的真實身份。
desc.zh_cn: 因为工作疲劳以及孩子们惹出的麻烦而疲惫不堪的旬，拜访了炼丹术研究会的沙耶，看看是否有对美容有益的药物。喝了从沙耶那里得到的「回春秘药」的旬，回到了以前的样子。不巧遇到老师的她，不由自主地隐瞒了自己的真实身份。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry

desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

name.en: 糖葫蘆 in 夢幻島
name.jp: 糖葫蘆 in 夢幻島
name.zh_cn: 糖葫芦 in 梦幻岛

desc.en: 梅花園的教官旬，喝了從沙耶那裡得到的「回春秘藥」，回到了小時候的樣子！隨著身體的變化，心也變年幼的她，在山海經的各處引起了各種麻煩……！？
desc.jp: 梅花園的教官旬，喝了從沙耶那裡得到的「回春秘藥」，回到了小時候的樣子！隨著身體的變化，心也變年幼的她，在山海經的各處引起了各種麻煩……！？
desc.zh_cn: 梅花园的教官旬，喝了从沙耶那里得到的「回春秘药」，回到了小时候的样子！随着身体的变化，心也变年幼的她，在山海经的各处引起了各种麻烦……！？

desc.en: 梅花園的教官旬，喝了從沙耶那裡得到的「回春秘藥」，回到了小時候的樣子！隨著身體的變化，心也變年幼的她，在山海經的各處引起了各種麻煩……！？
desc.jp: 梅花園的教官旬，喝了從沙耶那裡得到的「回春秘藥」，回到了小時候的樣子！隨著身體的變化，心也變年幼的她，在山海經的各處引起了各種麻煩……！？
desc.zh_cn: 梅花园的教官旬，喝了从沙耶那里得到的「回春秘药」，回到了小时候的样子！随着身体的变化，心也变年幼的她，在山海经的各处引起了各种麻烦……！？

desc.en: 老師詢問小旬是否真的是梅花園的孩子。正當小旬不知該如何回答時，沙耶出現了，老師因此發現她就是旬。小旬否認並逃走，看到此情況的沙耶，表示如果不快點讓她吃下解藥，可能會有麻煩。
desc.jp: 老師詢問小旬是否真的是梅花園的孩子。正當小旬不知該如何回答時，沙耶出現了，老師因此發現她就是旬。小旬否認並逃走，看到此情況的沙耶，表示如果不快點讓她吃下解藥，可能會有麻煩。
desc.zh_cn: 老师询问小旬是否真的是梅花园的孩子。正当小旬不知该如何回答时，沙耶出现了，老师因此发现她就是旬。小旬否认并逃走，看到此情况的沙耶，表示如果不快点让她吃下解药，可能会有麻烦。

desc.en: 沙耶與老師設下各種陷阱想抓住旬，但都以失敗告終。雖然兩人口中說著「這樣的話」並竭盡全力想抓住她，但桐乃正巧路過，沙耶和老師於是被帶去了警察局。
desc.jp: 沙耶與老師設下各種陷阱想抓住旬，但都以失敗告終。雖然兩人口中說著「這樣的話」並竭盡全力想抓住她，但桐乃正巧路過，沙耶和老師於是被帶去了警察局。
desc.zh_cn: 沙耶与老师设下各种陷阱想抓住旬，但都以失败告终。虽然两人口中说着「这样的话」并竭尽全力想抓住她，但桐乃正巧路过，沙耶和老师于是被带去了警察局。

long.jp: ヴァルキューレ警察学校

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 梅花園的教官旬，喝了從沙耶那裡得到的「回春秘藥」，回到了小時候的樣子！隨著身體的變化，心也變年幼的她，在山海經的各處引起了各種麻煩……！？
desc.jp: 梅花園的教官旬，喝了從沙耶那裡得到的「回春秘藥」，回到了小時候的樣子！隨著身體的變化，心也變年幼的她，在山海經的各處引起了各種麻煩……！？
desc.zh_cn: 梅花园的教官旬，喝了从沙耶那里得到的「回春秘药」，回到了小时候的样子！随着身体的变化，心也变年幼的她，在山海经的各处引起了各种麻烦……！？

desc.en: 梅花園的教官旬，喝了從沙耶那裡得到的「回春秘藥」，回到了小時候的樣子！隨著身體的變化，心也變年幼的她，在山海經的各處引起了各種麻煩……！？
desc.jp: 梅花園的教官旬，喝了從沙耶那裡得到的「回春秘藥」，回到了小時候的樣子！隨著身體的變化，心也變年幼的她，在山海經的各處引起了各種麻煩……！？
desc.zh_cn: 梅花园的教官旬，喝了从沙耶那里得到的「回春秘药」，回到了小时候的样子！随着身体的变化，心也变年幼的她，在山海经的各处引起了各种麻烦……！？

desc.en: 老師為今天無法履行約定而向沙耶道歉，並決定再次與旬對話。交談時，從旬的口中流露出身為教官所肩負的重任。旬說今天很放鬆，但她心中也有各種矛盾。這時，從遠處傳來了幼兒園孩子們的聲音……
desc.jp: 老師為今天無法履行約定而向沙耶道歉，並決定再次與旬對話。交談時，從旬的口中流露出身為教官所肩負的重任。旬說今天很放鬆，但她心中也有各種矛盾。這時，從遠處傳來了幼兒園孩子們的聲音……
desc.zh_cn: 老师为今天无法履行约定而向沙耶道歉，并决定再次与旬对话。交谈时，从旬的口中流露出身为教官所肩负的重任。旬说今天很放松，但她心中也有各种矛盾。这时，从远处传来了幼儿园孩子们的声音……

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子
